item.title: Add texture
item.description: Create a plane (Shift + A) Add a material by pressing new in the material tab. Add a texture by pressing new in the texture tab. Open the picture you want as texture. Change the view to UV-editing. Choose your picture in the list. Press TAB to go into edit mode and choose Unwrap (U) to paste the picture onto the plane. Make sure you are in Texture display mode

item.title: How to animate human models
item.description: Blender’s version used for this tutorial is v2.6b. And the tutorial video used as a reference: link Prepare the human model Import the make human model as described in the makeHuman model document (here) The model with be visible. Click the right extension tab to open additional kinematic option. Scroll down and change leg FK to IK both left and right. This is done to constrain the model to ground plane and easily manipulated to make the animation.

item.title: Importing human model to Blender
item.description: 1.Open Blender application, to import the make human model 2.File>user preference> files> Check auto run python script. 3.To add Makehuman importer 4.File>user preference> add ons> import-export> check make human importer 5.To Import the .mhx file go to files>import>make human(.mhx) 6.You can see the imported model on your workspace
